category.name: CAST_JEE_KB_Object
category.description: Represent a JEE symbol that can be persisted

property.name: javaProjectRef
property.description: A reference to the associated JAVA project.

category.name: CAST_Web_AllBeanProperties
category.description: Common category for all bean properties

property.name: archivedTabligExtractionFolder
property.description: Folder where is extracted this taglib if founded in an archive

category.name: CAST_JEE_TagLibCommonProperties
category.description: JSP Custom Tag Library Common properties

category.name: CAST_JEE_Struts2Properties
category.description: All struts2 properties for flex framework

property.name: method
property.description: Java method name for an action

property.name: globalResults
property.description: global results applicable to the action

category.name: CAST_JEE_Struts2Context
category.description: Allow to indicate the all the contexts that allowed to call the symbol in Struts2 framework

category.name: CAST_JEE_Context
category.description: Allow to indicate all the contexts that allowed to call the symbol in any framework

category.name: CAST_AvoidLongTableAndColumnNames
category.description: Avoid table and column names that are too long (portability)

property.name: avoidLongTableAndColumnNames
property.description: Avoid table and column names that are too long (portability)

category.name: CAST_JEE_SpringBatchKeyInterfaces
category.description: key Interface can be itemReader itemProcessor or itemWriter

type.name: CAST_JEE_SpringBeanProperty
type.description: Property of a Spring bean used for dependency injection

property.name: confirmBeforeSaving
property.description: Select this option when you want to confirm saving or not

property.name: isWebApplication
property.description: Set to true when your JEE application is a Web application.

property.name: runLegacyWebAnalyzer
property.description: If 1 the legacy HTML JS analyzer is executed

category.name: CAST_JEE_JobOptions_TraceSettings
category.description: JEE Job Option - Keeping Information Generated During Annalysis For Debugging Purpose

property.name: keepGeneratedFilesFromJavaAnnotations
property.description: Keep Generated Files from Java Annotations

property.name: keepGeneratedCASTScriptsFromXMLAndAnnotations
property.description: Keep Generated CAST Scripts from XML and Annotations

property.name: keepGeneratedFilesFromUserInputSecurityDiagnostics
property.description: Keep Generated Files from User Input Security Diagnostics

property.name: bootstrapOnly
property.description: If equals to 1, the job is used only as bootstrap to execute another exe

type.name: CAST_JEE_AnalysisContext
type.description: Bundle of configuration settings associated to a source file of any kind

property.name: visibleContexts
property.description: The list of visible context from the current one

type.name: CAST_JEE_TextReplacementOption
type.description: Advanced options centred around replacing Regular Expressions in the files that are to be analyzed

type.name: CAST_JEE_JavaFilesSelectionOption
type.description: JavaFiles Selection option. It allows you to select files that are to be analyzed when the job is run

type.name: CAST_JEE_ServerFilesSelectionOption
type.description: Server Files Selection option. It allows you to select files that are to be analyzed when the job is run

type.name: CAST_JEE_ClientFilesSelectionOption
type.description: Client Files Selection option. It allows you to select files that are to be analyzed when the job is run

type.name: CAST_JEE_PropertyFilesSelectionOption
type.description: Property Files Selection option. It allows you to select files that are to be analyzed when the job is run

type.name: CAST_JEE_XMLFilesSelectionOption
type.description: Property Files Selection option. It allows you to select files that are to be analyzed when the job is run

type.name: CAST_JEE_ClasspathSelectionOption
type.description: Classpath of a job. For a JEE job, this is specific to the Java files in your project.

type.name: CAST_JEE_WebAppDescriptorOption
type.description: Use this option to choose your J2EE application's Web Deployment Descriptor

property.name: path
property.description: The path of the web.xml file

property.name: javaExtension
property.description: The extensions for java files. Of The form *.java;...

property.name: serverExtension
property.description: The extensions for web server files. Of The form *.jsp;...

property.name: clientExtension
property.description: The extensions for web client files. Of The form *.html;...

property.name: xmlExtension
property.description: The extensions for web xml files. Of The form *.xml;...

property.name: propertyExtension
property.description: The extensions for property files. Of The form *.properties;...

type.name: CAST_JEE_TestSelection
type.description: Files selection used inside unit tests.

type.name: CAST_JEE_TestClasspath
type.description: Files selection used inside unit tests.

type.name: CAST_JEE_TestProfile
type.description: Environment profiles used inside unit tests.

type.name: CAST_JEE_EJB2Profile
type.description: Parameters of an EJB2 environment profile

type.name: CAST_JEE_WebServicesProfile
type.description: Parameters of a Web Services environment profile

property.name: selections
property.description: The list of selected files for the current analysis

property.name: profiles
property.description: Selected profiles id, eg CAST_JAVA_LOG4J_1214. See configuration/EnvProf/Cast.aex

property.name: classpathes
property.description: Selected classpath. You may select a jar file or a directory of jars. You must select at least a rt.jar

property.name: profiles
property.description: Selected profiles id, eg CAST_JAVA_LOG4J_1214. See configuration/EnvProf/Cast.aex

property.name: classpathes
property.description: Selected classpath. You may select a jar file or a directory of jars. You must select at least a rt.jar

category.name: CAST_JEE_Properties
category.description: specific properties for J2EE frameworks objects

property.name: nonProxyableViolation
property.description: Set to one if the object cannot be proxied though it is expected by a framework

category.name: CAST_JEE_SQLLink
category.description: Properties on SQL links for JEE Framework

type.name: CAST_JEE_Struts2_ResolutionTemplate
type.description: A general resolution query to be instantiated

category.name: CAST_JEE_Managed
category.description: JEE objects managed by a framework
